00040 #define PCRE_GLOBAL 0x10000

00054         void zero()
00055                 {
00056                 U_TRACE(0, "UPCRE::zero()")
00057 
00058                 tables       = 0;
00059                 p_pcre       = 0;
00060                 sub_vec      = 0;
00061                 err_str      = 0;
00062                 resultset    = 0;
00063                 stringlist   = 0;
00064                 num_matches  = -1;
00065                 p_pcre_extra = 0;
00066                 }
00067 
00068         /* reset all counters and free objects, prepare for another search */
00069 
00070         void reset()
00071                 {
00072                 U_TRACE(0, "UPCRE::reset()")
00073 
00074                 did_match   = false;
00075                 num_matches = -1;
00076                 }
00077 
00087         UPCRE()
00088                 {
00089                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UPCRE, "", 0)
00090 
00091                 zero();
00092                 }

00117         UPCRE(const UString& expression, int flags);
00118 
00134         UPCRE(const UString& expression, const char* flags = "") : _expression(expression)
00135                 {
00136                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UPCRE, "%.*S,%S", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(expression), flags)
00137 
00138                 _flags = 0;
00139 
00140                 for (int i = 0; flags[i] != '\0'; ++i)
00141                         {
00142                         switch (flags[i])
00143                                 {
00144                                 case 'i': _flags |= PCRE_CASELESS;  case_t = true;   break;
00145                                 case 'm': _flags |= PCRE_MULTILINE;                  break;
00146                                 case 's': _flags |= PCRE_DOTALL;                     break;
00147                                 case 'x': _flags |= PCRE_EXTENDED;                   break;
00148                                 case 'g':                           global_t = true; break;
00149                                 }
00150                         }
00151 
00152                 zero();
00153                 compile();
00154                 }
00155 
00160         ~UPCRE()
00161                 {
00162                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UPCRE)
00163 
00164                 /* avoid deleting of uninitialized pointers */
00165 
00166                 if (p_pcre)       pcre_free(p_pcre);
00167                 if (p_pcre_extra) pcre_free(p_pcre_extra);
00168 
00169                 if (sub_vec) U_FREE_N(sub_vec, sub_len, int);
00170 
00171                 if (stringlist)
00172                         {
00173                         pcre_free_substring_list(stringlist);
00174 
00175                         U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(resultset)
00176 
00177                         delete resultset;
00178                         }
00179                 }
00180 
00187         void set(const UString& expression)
00188                 {
00189                 U_TRACE(0, "UPCRE::set(%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(expression))
00190 
00191                 if (expression.empty() == false)
00192                         {
00193                         _flags      = 0;
00194                         _expression = expression;
00195 
00196                         case_t = global_t = false;
00197 
00198                         reset();
00199                         compile();
00200                         }
00201                 }
00202 
00203         UString getMask() { return _expression; }

00234         void study(int options = 0)
00235                 {
00236                 U_TRACE(0, "UPCRE::study(%d)", options)
00237 
00238                 p_pcre_extra = pcre_study(p_pcre, options, (const char**)(&err_str));
00239 
00240 #       ifdef DEBUG
00241                 if (err_str)
00242                         {
00243                         U_INTERNAL_DUMP("pcre_study(..) failed: %S", err_str);
00244                         }
00245 #       endif
00246                 }

00301         UString getMatch(int pos)
00302                 {
00303                 U_TRACE(0, "UPCRE::getMatch(%d)", pos)
00304 
00305                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(resultset)
00306                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_RANGE(0,pos,num_matches)
00307 
00308                 return resultset->at(pos);
00309                 }

00319         uint32_t getMatchLength(int pos) { return getMatch(pos).size(); }

00336         UString operator[](int index) { return getMatch(index); }

00355         int getMatchStart()
00356                 {
00357                 U_TRACE(0, "UPCRE::getMatchStart()")
00358 
00359                 int result = (sub_vec ? sub_vec[0] : -1);
00360 
00361                 U_RETURN(result);
00362                 }
00363 
00384         int getMatchStart(int pos)
00385                 {
00386                 U_TRACE(0, "UPCRE::getMatchStart(%d)", pos)
00387 
00388                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_RANGE(0,pos,num_matches)
00389 
00390                 /* sub_vec[0] and [1] is the start/end of the entire string. */
00391 
00392                 int result = sub_vec[ (++pos) * 2 ];
00393 
00394                 U_RETURN(result);
00395                 }
00396 
00415         int getMatchEnd()
00416                 {
00417                 U_TRACE(0, "UPCRE::getMatchEnd()")
00418 
00419                 int result = (sub_vec ? sub_vec[1] - 1 : -1);
00420 
00421                 U_RETURN(result);
00422                 }
00423 
00444         int getMatchEnd(int pos)
00445                 {
00446                 U_TRACE(0, "UPCRE::getMatchEnd(%d)", pos)
00447 
00448                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_RANGE(0,pos,num_matches)
00449 
00450                 /* the end offset of a subpattern points to the first offset of the next substring, therefore -1 */
00451 
00452                 int result = sub_vec[ ((++pos) * 2) + 1 ] - 1;
00453 
00454                 U_RETURN(result);
00455                 }
